title: When To Buy or Rent Heavy Equipment

tasks.task: Driving or operating a combine harvester.
subtasks: Starting the combine harvester's engine.
Navigating the combine harvester through a field.
Operating the combine harvester's threshing mechanism.
Monitoring grain output from the combine harvester.

tasks.task: Dumping harvested grain.
subtasks: Guiding a grain wagon into position beside the combine harvester.
Loading grain from the combine harvester onto the wagon.
Securing the grain on the wagon.

tasks.task: Controlling a grain wagon.
subtasks: Operating the grain wagon's unloading mechanism.
Adjusting the wagon's speed as it moves between fields.

tasks.task: Driving a truck to transport grain.
subtasks: Loading grain into the truck bed.
Securing the grain in the truck bed to prevent spillage.
Driving the truck to a storage facility.

tasks.task: Unloading grain from the truck.
subtasks: Guiding the grain wagon under the trailer or bin.
Dumping the grain from the wagon into the storage facility.
Clearing excess grain from the wagon.

tasks.task: Unloading a grain wagon at the storage facility.
subtasks: Aligning the wagon with the unloading spout.
Opening the grain wagon's unloading gate.
Monitoring the flow of grain and regulating the gate if necessary.

tasks.task: Cleaning and stowing the combine harvester.
subtasks: Shutting down the combine harvester.
Removing any attached implements or attachments.
Towing the combine harvester back to the farm yard.
Parking the harvester in a designated area.

tasks.task: Cleaning and stowing the grain wagon.
subtasks: Tipping the grain wagon to empty any remaining grain.
Folding or retracting any extendable parts.
Securing the wagon in a storage area.

tasks.task: Refueling the truck.
subtasks: Pulling the truck into a fueling station.
Connecting the fuel hose to the truck's fill port.
Ensuring the truck is properly topped up with diesel fuel.

tasks.task: Returning the grain to the storage bin.
subtasks: Monitoring the grain level in the bin.
Adjusting the grain wagon's unloading speed as needed.
